remarks: Any complex module equipped with the betweenness operation fulfills the identity of betweenness (Axiom A6).  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Mar-2019.)
statement:
ttgval.n $e |- G = ( toTG ` H ) $.
ttgitvval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ttgitvval.b $e |- P = ( Base ` H ) $.
ttgitvval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` H ) $.
ttgitvval.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` H ) $.
ttgelitv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
ttgelitv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. P ) $.
ttgbtwnid.r $e |- R = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` H ) ) $.
ttgbtwnid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( 0 [,] 1 ) C_ R ) $.
ttgbtwnid.1 $e |- ( ph -> H e. CMod ) $.
ttgbtwnid.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( X I X ) ) $.
ttgbtwnid $p |- ( ph -> X = Y ) $.
